answers.answer: I had to. It turned out to be normal but because my blood pressure was still high with no explanation they sent me a few times to test. Always came back normal tho

question: I went in for my 34 week check up and my blood pressure was high a second time and I've been retaining a lot water so my OB sent me to the hospital to be tested for preeclampsia. Now I'm doing the 24 hour urine test.Has anyone else had to do this? Did it turn out okay?
title: Anyone been tested for preeclampsia?
